I have made this year after year and it is part of our Christmas tradition. Hot crust pastry is not popular in my house so I use normal pastry and cook in a cake tin to give it support. After it is cooked it does not need that support of course. Always the first to go at parties.

Really nice. I browned the pigs first. Also added mushrooms. As my oven was playing up, I put everything in at the same time. Added the liquid as per recipe, but did have to finish it off on the hob although that might have been down to the oven. Will definitely make again.
